1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Completing the national jet software, Sehnaz's death deeply affects her daughter Bahar. Those who caused the death of Sehnaz are now following Bahar.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Sehnaz, the night before boarding the plane, thanks to the plan she made with Selcuk has managed to keep the copy of the software in a safe place. Aziz does not believe in saying that she destroyed the software; He threatens to injure her. Seeing the dark face of the Aziz, Sehnaz searches for ways to get rid of the place where she was hid. Bahar never accepts the fact that Hayati is her father.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Hayati thinks that Ozan, who emerges at one point and holds a gun in his head, is one of the men who set a trap for his daughter. How will Ozan survive this situation? He must gain the trust of Hayati and Bahar and help them escape from it, as well as go through Aziz's men without revealing his identity. Selçuk reaches Bahar. Bahar, who hopes to cooperate with Selçuk in naming her mother's name, is experiencing a great disappointment. Selçuk wants money for the program, he will flee abroad. But Bahar, who has confiscated all of her accounts, has no money. Hayati says ...

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Bahar learned her mother was alive. There is now one goal; to find her mother. The program that everyone is after is now in the hands of Bahar. Bahar realizes that they keep her mother alive for the program. Will she be able to prevent Hayati from giving program to Aziz? When the place where Sehnaz is held is revealed, Aziz is mad. Ozan, on the one hand collecting the back of his father on the one hand he lied his father to keep Bahar alive. When Aziz catches the lie of Ozan, he pulls the rope of Bahar, and he said Bahar will die. Father and daughter's ways are ...

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Hayati and Bahar's plan reveal the dark face of Aziz. The father and the girl decide not to reveal what they know to Aziz for a while and to be as close to Aziz as possible. Bahar and Hayati play as if traitor in the company believed that they were Sevda. Aziz, who is disturbed by Hayati's presence, wants Ozan to kill him. Ozan does not know what to do. Hayati plays a final game to get rid of Kemal.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Aziz uses Bahar and prepares a bad surprise for Sehnaz. The purpose of the Aziz is to make the Sehnaz write the program. Aziz is unaware that himself is exposed. Aziz, unwittingly, will do Bahar a great favor.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Hayati tells Ozan that he will die and wants his help. He will entrust his daughter to Ozan. This is a movement that the Ozan has never expected. Ozan, who received orders from the Aziz to kill Hayati, does not know what to do. Commissar Bekir has reached one of the kidnappers of Sehnaz. The man will tell him everything. Hayati takes Ozan with him and goes to see the informant. Circle begins to shrink for Ozan. He is in danger of going out. Selçuk in wakes up. Aziz learns that program is in Bahar. Aziz has a single purpose now, take Bahar.

8.title: Final
8.plot: Ozan will do his best to save Bahar and Hayati. Kemal seeks Hayati and Bahar. Aziz gives the death order of Tolga, one of the engineers in the company. Tolga, a successful engineer in his business, is about to find out the truth about Sehnaz. Aziz makes a treacherous plan. He will kill Tolga, but he will make it look like suicide. An engineer suicide is about to happen (!)

imdb.plot outline: College student Bahar is a clever, lively and a cheerful girl. She is grown in wealth. While leading a happy life with her husband one day everything turns upside down. Her mother Sehnaz who had been working in the company called Lotus as a software engineer is killed. Bahar is scattered from her safe life to a dark world. The people who killed her mother are somehow after Bahar now. Bahar tries to stay alive while trying to solve the mystery behind her mother's death. Her paths cross with an unexpected person during her adventure full of surprises. She has to cooperate with Hayati, a former mafia who has blood on his hands. In time this obligation turns in to an unexpected bond between them. This bond is literally like a clash of two different worlds. Thanks to Bahar, Hayati discovers the goodness in him while Bahar confronts her dark side. Now Bahar and Hayati have a common goal; Sehnaz. Bahar will get her hands dirty while Hayati cleans his dirty life. In her path with Hayati she will see that the masks of the people she trusts have come off. Meeting the person who's responsible for her mother's murder will give her the shock of her life. During this period she has lost faith in her husband and has closed the doors on love. Until she meets Ozan. Their emotional connection turns into a big love affair. But another shock is awaiting Bahar in this path too. All through this time Bahar and Hayati, who has always been by Bahar's side, never deviate from their goal. They will solve the truth about Sehnaz.
imdb.title: 8 Gun
plot: It's about the changing life of Bahar, who confronts the dark guys who are pursuing the software that the deceased mother produces.::ahmetkozan
